original_text: Then the king returned to his palace and spent the night without eating and without any entertainment being brought to him. And he could not sleep.
korean_text: 왕이 궁에 돌아가서는 밤이 새도록 금식하고 그 앞에 오락을 그치고 잠자기를 마다하니라

sentences.original_text: Then the king returned to his palace
and spent the night without eating
and without any entertainment being brought to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그에게 어떤 오락도 가져지지 않았습니다
그리고 그는 잠을 잘 수 없었습니다
